content: धैर्यं [धीरस्य भावः कर्म वा ष्यञ] {@--1@} Firmness, durability, strength, constancy, steadiness, stability, fortitude, courage; धैर्यमवष्टभ्य <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; विपदि धैर्यं <ls>Bh. 2. 63</ls>; so धैर्यवृत्ति <ls>Śi. 9. 59.</ls> {@--2@} Calmness, composure. {@--3@} Gravity, patience. {@--4@} Inflexibility. {@--5@} Boldness, forwardness; <ls>Me. 40</ls> (धाष्ट्ये <ls>Malli.</ls>).
